meanings.definition: A book or set of books containing articles on various topics, usually arranged in alphabetical order
meanings.sent1: I found a lot of information in the cyclopedias at the library.
meanings.sent2: Students often use cyclopedias to research different subjects for their projects.
meanings.sent3: The cyclopedias on the shelf looked like a colorful mountain of knowledge.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a vast landscape, each memory a page in the cyclopedias of her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The cyclopedias whispered secrets of the world's wonders.

meanings.definition: A comprehensive reference work containing articles on a wide range of subjects
meanings.sent1: The internet has become a popular alternative to traditional cyclopedias.
meanings.sent2: Libraries often have cyclopedias that cover a wide variety of topics.
meanings.sent3: The cyclopedias seemed to hold the answers to all of life's mysteries.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, he was a walking cyclopedias of interesting facts.
meanings.sent5: His mind was a labyrinth of interconnected cyclopedias waiting to be explored.
